name: Google White & Blue
description:
derived from style 49963 by user 59100
This makes Google Search use blue as its accent color, instead of red.
It also makes the Google Toolbar blue on white, instead of the default red on black.

Problems? https://github.com/decktrio/Google-White---Blue/issues
If either of the copyright holders thinks I've violated GPLv2, please send me a message here: http://forum.userstyles.org/messages/add/decktrio
